ProductClassificationAttr.name: ProductClassificationAttr
ProductClassificationAttr.description: Represents the relationship between a product classification and its attributes. This is the default configuration for products based on the product classification.

AttributeCategoryId.description: The ID of the attribute category assigned to the parent object.

AttributeDefinitionId.description: The ID of the attribute assigned to the parent object.

AttributeNameOverride.description: The overridden attribute name to display for the attribute when shown for this object. For example, "Color" overridden to "Laptop Color."

DefaultValue.description: The default value of the attribute for a product based on the product classification. This value can be changed.

Description.description: The description of this product classification attribute definition.

DisplayType.description: The type to display data for the selected data type.

ExcludedPicklistValues.description: The picklist values excluded from the attribute picklist. This field ensures that the product classification attribute only has valid values.

HelpText.description: The help text to display when end users are configuring this attribute. This field overrides the help text defined for the attribute itself.

IsHidden.description: Indicates if this product attribute is hidden from end users in the run time (true) or not (false).

IsPriceImpacting.description: Indicates whether this attribute dictates the price of a product (true) or not (false).

IsReadOnly.description: Indicates whether the attribute is read-only for users in the run time (true) or not (false).

IsRequired.description: Indicates whether this attribute requires a value when assigned to a parent object (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The date the product classification attribute was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The date the product classification attribute was last viewed.

MaximumCharacterCount.description: The maximum number of characters that can be entered for an attribute value.

MaximumValue.description: The maximum value that can be entered as an attribute value.

MinimumCharacterCount.description: The minimum number of characters that can be entered for an attribute value.

MinimumValue.description: The minimum value that can be entered as an attribute value.

Name.description: The name of the product classification attribute.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the product classification attribute owner.

ProductClassificationId.description: The ID of the product classification that the attribute is associated with. This field is unique within your organization.

Sequence.description: The display sequence of the attribute when configuring the product during run time.

Status.description: The lifecycle status of the product classification attribute.

StepValue.description: The increment or decrement by which a slider's value changes as the user adjusts the product classification attribute value. Available in API version 61.0 and later.

ValueDescription.description: The description of the value assigned to this attribute. This field takes on the value description from the attribute definition.
